thread.title: Massillon prepares for another elusive QB
thread.title_full: Massillon prepares for another elusive QB

title: Massillon prepares for another elusive QB
text: Massillon prepares for another elusive QB Massillon’s defense has seen its share of rushing threats at quarterback this season. However, the Tigers may be facing their toughest test in that regard of all this week in Mount Healthy’s David Montgomery. Comment Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 1:02 AM Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 1:02 AM » RELATED CONTENT Click here to read the story on FridayNightOhio.com .
